sn35.60:1: "Bhikkhus, I will teach you the Dhamma for the full understanding of all clinging.[n.24] For the four kinds of clinging(upādāna), seeSN2.2,45:73; for the three kinds of full understanding (pariññā), see n.above.Spkparaphrases: "For the full understanding of all four kinds of clinging by the three kinds of full understanding."Listen to that …
